mapper.insert: MERGE INTO settings USING (SELECT CAST(#{mauUserId} AS INTEGER) , CAST(#{name} AS TEXT) , CAST(#{value} AS TEXT)) AS source (source_mau_userid, source_name, source_value) ON (mau_userid = source.source_mau_userid AND name = source.source_name) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET "value" = source.source_value WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( mau_userid , name , "value" ) VALUES ( source_mau_userid , source_name , source_value )
